name: NODA shuichi
bio:
Web Marketer & Automation Consultant

With a background in web production at Recruit and over a decade of experience serving major enterprises, I specialize in combining Web Marketing with AI Automation. I help businesses adopt "new ways of working" through digital transformation.

My Expertise:

Web Marketing: GA4 migration and in-house team training.

AI Automation: Using tools like n8n to streamline marketing and back-office workflows for maximum efficiency.
